name: Mike Goldberg
summary: Full-stack developer with experience working on greenfield projects for leading companies such as Samsung, ServiceNow, and The Daily. I've worked in advertising, news media, product development, streaming video, and enterprise software. I've worked individually, or on agile/cross-functional teams to complete websites, web apps, and prototypes.
